origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EconomicImpactAPI.evaluate_policy_effect', 'description': 'This function evaluates the effect of a policy on a specific sector by analyzing financing data.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the policy to evaluate, e.g., financial_support_cultural_industries.'}, {'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector to evaluate the effect on, e.g., cultural_creative.'}, {'name': 'evaluationMethod', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The method used for evaluation, e.g., financing_data_analysis.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'effectReport', 'description': 'A report detailing the effect of the policy on the sector.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EconomicImpactAPI.evaluate_policy_effect, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyName'是'financial_support_cultural_industries', 'sector'是'cultural_creative', 'evaluationMethod'是'financing_data_analysis'.
